description: The rapper wore the chain, which features 16,000 diamonds and totals 155 carats, at Coachella this past weekend.
maintext:
By Abby Hassler
Lil Uzi Vert just became the worldâ€™s biggest Marilyn Manson fan by dropping $220,000 on a brand new chain featuring Manson rocking Mickey Mouse ears, according to TMZ.
Celebrity jeweler Ben Baller presented the chain from IF & Co. Jewelers to Uzi this Sunday (April 16). Uzi wore the new piece, which features 16,000 diamonds and totals 155 carats at Coachella this past weekend.

title: Lil Uzi Vert Drops $220K for Marilyn Manson Chain
